#summary Additional bonus after a hit was done and damage calculated

= Usage =
`[events e_attunement]
on=@hitdamagebonus
if <argo> == <findid(i_attunement).tag0.weap> && <src> == <findid(i_attunement).link>
var0.<uid>_damagebonus += 50
endif`

[I]: Hitter
SRC: Hit
ARGO: Weapon used to hit

var0.<uid>_damagebonus +=: Used to add additional damage, in percentage.
